posts.post: What's the video where Ross videotaped everyone on the couch?

Op is dead.
And I'm not op.

If I'm high and you're high, what does that make us?
[removed]

What's the point? (15 m)( rant)
I'm just young and terribly depressed. What's the point of life? What is there out there? If I killed myself, who would give a flying fuck about me? Sure I have friends but they'll get over me, right? What difference would it be if a 15 year old fuck-up from Missouri decided to take his own life. Somebody please answer me! Give me reasons! Please... Edit: I apologize for this everyone. I had a temporary mental breakdown. I thank you all who helped... Or tried to.
posts.Post Summary:
A maladaptive self-state is evident and dominant in this post. The writer expresses feelings of depression, with hopelessness and suicidal thoughts recurring throughout. They also demonstrate a highly critical perspective of both themselves and others.

However, the mention of having friends suggests that they perceive themselves as capable of forming connections and recognize others as relatable. Additionally, their apology at the end of the post indicates an element of relational behavior toward others.

C-O.Category: (1) Perception of the other as related

A.highlighted_evidence:
What's the point? (15 m)( rant)
I'm just young and terribly depressed

C-S.highlighted_evidence: What difference would it be if a 15 year old fuck-up from Missouri decided to take his own life.

C-O.Category: (2) Perception of the other as detached or over attached

D.Category: (6) Expectation that competence needs will not be met
D.highlighted_evidence: What's the point of life? What is there out there? If I killed myself, who would give a flying fuck about me?

posts.post:
It looks like the universe is trying to tell me something.[rant]
Well... There's this girl that I *really* like. I asked her to homecoming and she said yes. I asked her out 2 weeks after that, she said she wasn't over her ex which was my best friend ( yeah, leftovers what the fuck is it to you?). He CONSTANTLY ridiculed me for it. Then today, I had a complete mental breakdown with crying, suicidal thoughts, and posts to/r/suicidewatch . I took a nap, and then I woke up and felt the best I've ever felt I. the Past 4 months. I texted her,i and she told me that she can't go to homecoming with me because it would be "awkward". Fucking hilarious right? Like this is all some ducking elaborate prank where every girl who says she's interested in me, FUCKING goes back and fucks me over. Everything is going the exact opposite to plan! Hilarious, right? I just want to FUCKING laugh to my grave.
posts.Post Summary:
There is a dominant maladaptive self-state focused on the perception that others are detached from him—whether it's a friend who ridicules him or the girl he asks to homecoming. Additionally, there is a subtle sense of self-criticism when things do not go according to his plans, which contributes to manic episodes, breakdowns, and thoughts of self-harm, along with avoidance behaviors as a means of dissociation.

The adaptive element evident in the post is his perception of himself as capable of connecting with others, as shown when he asks the girl to homecoming.

B-O.highlighted_evidence: There's this girl that I *really* like. I asked her to homecoming

A.highlighted_evidence: I just want to FUCKING laugh to my grave

B-S.highlighted_evidence: Then today, I had a complete mental breakdown with crying, suicidal thoughts, and posts to/r/suicidewatch .

C-S.highlighted_evidence: Everything is going the exact opposite to plan!

C-O.Category: (2) Perception of the other as detached or over attached
C-O.highlighted_evidence: Like this is all some ducking elaborate prank where every girl who says she's interested in me, FUCKING goes back and fucks me over.

posts.post: I would rather put an Alive rat down my pants
Users from /r/writingprompts talk about their day.

timeline_summary: Fluctuations are evident in the post, and it would be interesting to explore the writer further to better understand how their self-states change over time.
